newsitem.title: CANADA: DBRS assigns rating to Laidlaw debt.
newsitem.headline: DBRS assigns rating to Laidlaw debt.

text.p: Dominion Bond Rating Service Ltd said on Thursday that it assigned a BBB (high) rating to the unsecured debentures of Laidlaw Inc.
"The company has strong competitive positions in its existing operations, as well as stable profitability," the rating agency said.
The rating also recognized the favorable impact from Laidlaw's decision earlier this year to sell its solid waste business, DBRS said.
